Condensed milk, evaporated  
milk, dried milk, sheep’s milk, 
goats’ milk, or any other type 
of ‘milk’ drink (such as rice, 
oat, almond, soy, coconut, 
flax	or	hemp	drinks)	should	
never be given to a baby 
under the age of one year. 
You should not use soya 
formula unless it has been 
prescribed by your GP.
If you are giving your baby 
infant	formula,	first	infant	
formula (whey-based) is the 
only formula they will need 
in	the	first	year.
